name: Never eXecute vulnerability
description: The binary does not have NX bit set. NX bit offers protection against exploitation of memory corruption vulnerabilities by marking memory page as non-executable. However, iOS never allows an app to execute from writeable memory. You do not need to specifically enable the NX bit because it's always enabled for all third-party code.

references.text: Further information can be found in [[1]], [[2]] and [[3]].
